oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Tennessee State Fairgrounds Fire
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On Monday night, September 20, 1965, fire broke out at the Tennessee State Fairgrounds. The fire destroyed the Woman's Building and the Grandstands. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Fairgrounds
Disasters; Fires; Fairs
Nashville (Tenn.)
